insert into wa_train_organization.import_record_detail(org_id, import_record_id, real_name, phone, sex, id_number, dept_name, group_name, success, failure_reason) values
(#{entity.orgId}, #{entity.importRecordId}, #{entity.realName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.idNumber}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.success}, #{entity.failureReason})

insert into wa_train_organization.import_record_detail(org_id, import_record_id, real_name, phone, sex, id_number, dept_name, group_name, success, failure_reason) values
(#{entity.orgId}, #{entity.importRecordId}, #{entity.realName}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.idNumber}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.groupName}, #{entity.success}, #{entity.failureReason})
on duplicate key update org_id = values(org_id) , import_record_id = values(import_record_id) , real_name = values(real_name) , phone = values(phone) , sex = values(sex) , id_number = values(id_number) , dept_name = values(dept_name) , group_name = values(group_name) , success = values(success) , failure_reason = values(failure_reason) $empty
